ImageKit.io sponsor

Google Docs Shifting to Canvas Based Rendering â€” I think this could be a more substantial long term move than it appears at first as itâ€™s a whole new way to approach rendering content in the browser (and one more commonly associated with games and graphics, so far). Theyâ€™ve rigged up this demo of theÂ approach.

items.content:
Frontend Focus

#â€‹490 â€” May 12, 2021 | Read on the web

Bootstrap 5 Released â€” This is a big release for the ever popular CSS framework with plenty of notable changes, including new components, updated forms, RTL support, and the removal of jQuery.

Mark Otto

Can I Email..? Support Tables for HTML and CSS in Emails â€” Itâ€™s like Can I Use but for email clients and their varying levels of HTML and CSS support. We first linked this about 18 months ago but itâ€™s had a bunch of updatesÂ recently.

HTeuMeuLeu

Modern Dropdowns in Angular Made Easy - A Quick Tutorial â€” While a vanilla dropdown is a simple HTML element, more advanced features can get tricky. In 13 minutes, you will learn how to bind data, implement autocomplete, and more using Kendo UI for Angular. No purchase required, so give it aÂ try.

Kendo UI for Angular sponsor
